title: Black screen bug/problem

embed.description: Snaggy is an image hosting service that lets you paste images from your clipboard directly online.

body: whenever my game/client goes into champion select this happens and just stays black until either the timer runs out and i get kicked for not choosing a champ or until i close it. how can i fix this?

replies.body: I have the same problem, it usually gets fixed after I repair the game. But the problem reappears after I log in again like the next day. Repaired three times, and reinstalled two days back have that problem now :/
I even tried those in the connection guides for league. Same thing.

It looks like your client isn't displaying champ select due to a potentially poor connection to our matchmaking servers. This usually happens under the condition that there are either local network configurations that conflict with League or if there are issues along your network routing. I recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure everything on your end is configured properly for League.

Please get back to me if you continue to have issues with reaching champ select after taking those steps.
also not sure if i am the only one with this problem. i un-installed and re-installed it but it only lasted for a few games and went back to this again
